skins.shipDescription: Kongou-class fast battleship number two ®C Hiei.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Hiei, the first Kongou-class battleship born in the Land of the Rising Sun. As an Imperial Ship, I witnessed the growth of our mighty fleet, and led our forces into the Battle of the Solomon Sea. Commander, have you finished your preparations? The banquet is about to begin.
skins.acquisition: I am the Imperial Ship Hiei, second of the Kongou-class, reporting for duty. Commander, where shall we go next?
skins.login: There is nothing more relaxing than a banquet following a battle... By the way, Commander, I'm free after this...
skins.details: Hehe~ Which do you prefer: matcha, or black tea?
skins.secretaryIdle1: *Sigh*... Whenever Kirishima comes to a banquet, all those kids that tag along with her usually end up making a mess of things...
skins.secretaryIdle2: When it comes to warfare, wisdom and courage are equally important. We can't count on another miracle if we discard proper planning and rely on blind courage.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I'll be able to protect you, no matter the situation. Hehe, I am called an "Imperial Ship" because I have that capacity after all~?
skins.secretaryTouch: I can take you anywhere the ocean reaches.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hehe. Commander, have you not gotten enough sleep yet?

skins.shipDescription: Look how late it is... Commander, shall we embark on a dreamy voyage together?
skins.acquisition: Look how late it is... Commander, shall we embark on a dreamy voyage together?
skins.login: Adequate rest is important for improving your performance. Commander, I've prepared your pillow. Tonight... enjoy the best sleep of your life~
skins.details: Which pillow would you prefer? The soft one, the hard one, or... perhaps you'd like to use my thighs? Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hehe, it seems like we'll be able to have a pajama party banquet. How about it, Commander? Would you like to join?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Good night, Commander. Don't worry, I'll wake you up when the time is right.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ah, the plum blossoms shimmering under the moonlight... Commander, shall we go watch the petals together?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, the moon is beautiful tonight. Wouldn't you rather take in the beauty of the night sky instead of staring at me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hehe~ Someone seems quite energetic tonight, Commander.

skins.shipDescription: I have to admit, these qipaos from the Dragon Empery are quite elegant... I might sound arrogant saying this, but I feel like this outfit really brings out my charm. Hehe, wouldn't you agree, Commander?
skins.acquisition: I have to admit, these qipaos from the Dragon Empery are quite elegant... I might sound arrogant saying this, but I feel like this outfit really brings out my charm. Hehe, wouldn't you agree, Commander?
skins.login: Commander, you came at just the right time. The banquet is about to begin.
skins.details: I never expected this Spring Banquet to take on a life of its own... By the looks of things, everyone prefers it when the atmosphere is a bit livelier. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, make sure you remember to have your closing speech ready. All right?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You'd like... a red envelope as well? Normally, aren't you supposed to be giving out red envelopes to us? Heehee~
skins.secretaryIdle3: During these times, it's best to just put aside your work and enjoy the festivities.
skins.secretaryTouch: Sake...? Hehe, since it's a special occasion, I wouldn't mind sharing a cup with you~

skins.shipDescription: We're headed for the white sands of the beach today. We all could use a breather every now and then, so let's just enjoy the sea breeze today. Hehe~
skins.acquisition: We're headed for the white sands of the beach today. We all could use a breather every now and then, so let's just enjoy the sea breeze today. Hehe~
skins.login: Commander, is this scenery to your liking? The blue skies and seas, and the merriment of friends frolicking on the beach...
skins.details: Did my sand castle capture your interest? This was only possible because of the clement weather, after all~
skins.secretaryIdle1: A seaside picnic might not be as lavish as the banquets I usually hold, but I am confident in my abilities to throw the best event possible~ Hehe, don't worry, some girls from the Eagle Union are helping me out.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The seagulls are flying into the distance. I wonder if they're splitting apart or reuniting... Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh my, staying under this scorching sun indeed seems bad for my skin... Commander, would you be so kind as to help me apply the sunscreen?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, perhaps the sea breeze will help you come to your senses?
